holidays.title: National Resolution Planning Day
holidays.description: We are getting a headstart on setting goals for next year!

holidays.title: Falling Needles Family Fest Day
holidays.description: Get ready to take down your tree and clean up the house after Christmas.

holidays.title: Festival of Enormous Changes at the Last Minute
holidays.description: There are only two days left to fulfill and accomplish your goals, so get on with it!

holidays.title: Rizal Day
holidays.description: Let's remember and honor the life and works of Dr. Jose Rizal!

holidays.title: Sodium Bicarbonate Day
holidays.description: Sodium Bicarbonate is a versatile compound that is a benefit to anyone’s home.

holidays.title: Bandhunta Izzy’s Birthday
holidays.description: This American rapper has risen above the storms to impress fans from far and wide!

holidays.title: Brady Noon’s Birthday
holidays.description: He started his career at a really young age and is still going strong!

holidays.title: Carson Wentz’s Birthday
holidays.description: Wentz is a skilled athlete with a promising future who’s in the prime of his career.

holidays.title: Davy Jones’s Birthday
holidays.description: Jones also dabbled as a songwriter, writing five songs for The Monkees.

holidays.title: Ellie Goulding’s Birthday
holidays.description: Her career has consistently been on the upswing, and she has given her fans top-notch singles.

holidays.title: Joshua Hong’s Birthday
holidays.description: He rose to prominence for his amiable attitude, dashingly good looks, and singing prowess.

holidays.title: Justin Combs’s Birthday
holidays.description: This charming content creator is a social media star and the son of a famous rapper.

holidays.title: Kim Taehyung’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate one of the most famous K-pop stars, the talented and dashing Kim Taehyung.

holidays.title: Kristin Kreuk’s Birthday
holidays.description: Kristin Kreuk is a lovely, eccentric, and focused actress, and we wish her greater achievements.

holidays.title: Kristina Alice’s Birthday
holidays.description: Her portrayals of exquisite, attractive, enticing fashion and lifestyle choices leave spectators in awe.

holidays.title: Kylin Kalani’s Birthday
holidays.description: With her vibrant and attractive personality, she is undoubtedly a rising star in the fashion industry.

holidays.title: LeBron James’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented athlete is widely regarded as one of the greatest basketball players of all time.

holidays.title: Patti Smith’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented musician, singer-songwriter, and poet became known for fusing poetry and rock.

holidays.title: Raymond Cham Jr.’s Birthday
holidays.description: Here’s to a talented young actor and dancer, who we wish the best life can offer.

holidays.title: Stephanie Del Valle’s Birthday
holidays.description: Stephanie Del Valle won against contestants from 116 countries for the crown of Miss World 2016!

holidays.title: Tiger Woods’s Birthday
holidays.description: Titles, fame, and scandals — what has the life of this legendary golfer been like?

holidays.title: Tyrese Gibson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented performer knows how to make a hit song and a blockbuster film.

holidays.title: Yelawolf’s Birthday
holidays.description: American rapper Yelawolf is well known for his prolific collaborations and solo albums.
